links.to_node: tell the cops what I really saw and contradict my girlfriend
My testimony may lead to a more accurate understanding of the accident's circumstances by the police.
My relationship with my girlfriend might be strained or damaged due to my contradiction of her story.
The police may consider my account credible, potentially affecting the outcome of any legal or insurance proceedings.
My girlfriend might face legal or social consequences if it is determined she falsely accused the other driver of racial abuse.
The older man involved in the accident may feel vindicated by my account if it aligns more closely with his version of events.
